Package me.dessie.dessielib.core.events.slot

Class SlotUpdateEvent

java.lang.Object
org.bukkit.event.Event
org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerEvent
me.dessie.dessielib.core.events.slot.SlotUpdateEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.bukkit.event.Cancellable
public class SlotUpdateEvent extends org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerEvent implements org.bukkit.event.Cancellable
Fires when an Inventory slot has been detected to be changed. Note: All changes may not be caught, see UpdateType for ways this event can fire.
See Also:
  • UpdateType

  • Constructor Details

    • SlotUpdateEvent

      public SlotUpdateEvent(org.bukkit.entity.Player who, org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory inventory, int slot, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack newItem, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack oldItem, UpdateType updateType)
      Creates a new SlotUpdateEvent
      Parameters:
      who - The Player
      inventory - The Inventory that was updated
      slot - The slot that was updated
      newItem - The new ItemStack in that slot
      oldItem - The old ItemStack that was in the slot
      updateType - The update type of this event

    • SlotUpdateEvent

      public SlotUpdateEvent(org.bukkit.entity.Player who, org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory inventory, int slot, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack newItem, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack oldItem, UpdateType updateType, org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory newInv, org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory oldInv)
      Creates a new SlotUpdateEvent
      Parameters:
      who - The Player
      inventory - The Inventory that was updated
      slot - The slot that was updated
      newItem - The new ItemStack in that slot
      oldItem - The old ItemStack that was in the slot
      updateType - The update type of this event
      newInv - The updated Inventory when the UpdateType is UpdateType.INVENTORY_INTERACT
      oldInv - The old Inventory when the UpdateType is UpdateType.INVENTORY_INTERACT
